Posts.Content: Sep 4, 2014 10:56PM Doona wrote: saw the surgeon yesterday , have a full body and bone scan booked for mon and have the op the following mon . Surgeon seems to think lumpectomy with removal of lymph nodes , will be ok but has left the decision re mastectomy up to me ,will have 6 months of chemo afterwards . If i choose mastectomy he would like to do a double one , however he said there was very little difference in the reoccurrence rates . How do people decide , I keep changing my mind
